message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm interested in the product, but how about $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $110 is still a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's my final offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway again, Bob. I can do $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
